translation.zh: 网页弹出了一个视频

translation.zh: 视频里 他拿着斧头

translation.zh: 详细讲述了他做的事情

translation.zh: 我当时看到“砰！”

translation.zh: 这让人停下来思考

translation.zh: 他会不会要为本案负责？

translation.en: So as we're scouring the master bedroom where… where Mr. Galfy's body was found,
translation.zh: 然后 我们地毯式搜索 发现高菲先生尸体的主卧室

translation.zh: 其中一位探员让我看一张火车票

translation.en: and the date of the ticket was the day before.
translation.zh: 日期是前一天

translation.en: Sunday. It was Mother's Day, 9:38 a.m.
translation.zh: 周日 母亲节 早上9点38分

translation.en: So we sent people to the train station to see if there's video.
translation.zh: 我们马上派人去火车站看监控录像

translation.en: And we're looking to see if we could see the deceased Mr. Galfy.
translation.zh: 我们想着能不能看到过世的高菲先生

translation.zh: 我们通常没办法马上拿到录像的

translation.en: but in this case, we did.
translation.zh: 但这一次 立刻拿到了

translation.en: And in the video, you could see Mr. Galfy,
translation.zh: 视频里 我们看到了高菲先生

translation.en: and you can clearly see him purchase a ticket,
translation.zh: 可以清晰地看见他买了票

translation.en: and he takes the ticket, and he turns, and he gives it to somebody off-camera.
translation.zh: 取了票 转过身 给了一个没拍到的人

translation.en: And you can see it's another male, longish hair,
translation.zh: 能看出来也是一名男性 略长的头发

translation.en: sorta curly, with a backpack, and they're waiting for the train to come.
translation.zh: 略卷 背着大背包 两个人一起等火车

translation.en: [Dean] So we have this information on this Internet phenom,
translation.zh: 那么 我们已经有了 这位网络名人的信息

translation.en: Kai the Hatchet-Wielding Hitchhiker,
translation.zh: 就是挥斧头的搭车人阿凯

translation.en: as I think they named him out in California.
translation.zh: 我想他们是在加州让他出名的

translation.en: And we're looking at this video of New Jersey Transit
translation.zh: 而我们看着新泽西捷运的监控视频

translation.en: and saying to ourselves, "Is this possible?"
translation.zh: 禁不住问自己：“这有可能吗？

translation.en: "Is this the same guy out in California?"
translation.zh: 这难道就是加州那个家伙吗？”

translation.en: So a call was made
translation.zh: 于是我们打了电话

translation.en: to the Fresno, California police department.
translation.zh: 打给加州弗雷斯诺的警察局

translation.en: I talked to this detective who has a pretty heavy East Coast accent.
translation.zh: 我跟一位 东海岸口音很重的警探通了话

translation.en: He says, "Hey, we're looking for a guy."
translation.zh: 他说：“嘿 我们在找这么个人

translation.en: "Uh, he might be involved in a murder, but we're not sure at this point."
translation.zh: 他可能涉及一起谋杀案 但目前不能确定

translation.en: "It's some homeless guy. He was in Fresno a while back,"
translation.zh: 是个流浪汉 之前就在弗雷斯诺”

translation.en: and I say, "Kai? Are you looking for Kai?"
translation.zh: 我说：“是阿凯吗？ 你们是在找阿凯吗？”

translation.en: And he's like, "Give me all the information you have,"
translation.zh: 他说：“告诉我你们掌握的一切信息”

translation.en: so I get him everything I have.
translation.zh: 我就把所有线索都分享了

translation.en: And when we gave him the name we had, Lawrence Kai,
translation.zh: 我们告诉他找到的名字 罗伦斯凯

translation.en: they said, "Oh yeah, we know him as Kai, but his name is Caleb McGillvary."
translation.zh: 他们说：“哦对 我们知道他叫阿凯 但他真名是凯勒布麦基瓦利”

translation.en: He kinda puts the phone away, and I can hear him yell to the room, like,
translation.zh: 他似乎把电话挪开了一点 我听到他冲着屋里吼了几句

translation.en: "Hey, we finally found the motherfucker!"
translation.zh: “嘿 我们终于找到那个混蛋啦！”

translation.en: You know, it was an a-ha moment for us. It was, "Bingo. I think we have the guy."
translation.zh: 你知道 我们说这叫“啊哈”时刻 就是“没错 我觉得找对人了”

translation.en: And we learned from them that this guy's a nomad.
translation.zh: 我们从他们那里得知 这人是个游荡分子

translation.en: He lives off the earth.
translation.zh: 他靠天地为生

translation.en: He lives off the kindness of others.
translation.zh: 靠别人的善心为生

translation.en: He's an opportunist.
translation.zh: 是个机会主义者

translation.en: So the chance of him traveling cross-country
translation.zh: 所以 他很有可能穿越州际

translation.en: and being in New York is likely.
translation.zh: 到达纽约

translation.en: It gave us further confirmation that this guy, Kai, is our suspect.
translation.zh: 这让我们进一步确定 这个人 阿凯 就是我们的嫌疑人

translation.en: [Rob] So now we had to find Kai
translation.zh: 现在 我们就要找到阿凯

translation.en: He had a phone, but that was dead.
translation.zh: 他之前有电话 但已经没用了

translation.en: So then it was out to the public. We released a press statement.
translation.zh: 所以要靠公众力量 我们发布了新闻公告

translation.en: Breaking news. Minutes ago, we learned who police are searching for
translation.zh: 几分钟前 我们得知警方正在搜索

translation.en: in the murder of a lawyer in Clark, New Jersey.
translation.zh: 杀害新泽西克拉克律师的嫌疑人

translation.en: Wait until you hear who they are looking for.
translation.zh: 听好了 他们要找的人名叫

translation.en: Caleb Lawrence McGillvary.
translation.zh: 凯勒布罗伦斯麦基瓦利

translation.en: You might also know him as Kai the Hatchet-Wielding Hitchhiker.
translation.zh: 也许这个名字更熟： 挥斧头的搭车人阿凯

translation.en: He should be considered armed and dangerous.
translation.zh: 他被认为携带武器 十分危险

translation.en: They don't know where he is.
translation.zh: 警方并不知道他身在何处

translation.en: He relies on the generosity of strangers for food and lodging.
translation.zh: 他依靠陌生人慷慨提供食宿

translation.en: Remember, he's a hitchhiker. He could be anywhere.
translation.zh: 他是便车客 可能在任何地方

translation.en: Will he try to kill again? Will he kill again?
translation.zh: 他会尝试再次杀人吗？ 会再开杀戒吗？

translation.en: The thrill of the hunt is on.
translation.zh: 狩猎的刺激开始了

translation.en: [Jessob] I immediately reached out to him.
translation.zh: 我立刻联系了他

translation.en: I wanna talk to him and figure out what the fuck is going on.
translation.zh: 我要跟他谈谈 搞清楚这他妈的是怎么回事

translation.en: When you find out that the authorities are, you know, looking for someone
translation.zh: 当你发现当局在找的人

translation.en: that you've kind of grown to care about and you have a nice relationship with,
translation.zh: 是你已经习惯去关心的 关系很好的人的时候

translation.en: now they're looking, you know, at him for murder,
translation.zh: 尤其还是因为谋杀而追捕他

translation.en: I'm a mental mess.
translation.zh: 我真的头脑混乱

translation.zh: 我其中一个住得近的儿子到家门口来

translation.en: I said, "How are you doing?" He said, "Mom, have you heard?"
translation.zh: 我问：“你好吗？” “妈 你听说了吗？”

translation.en: I said, "Have I heard what?"
translation.zh: 我说：“听说了什么？”

translation.en: He said, "Have you heard that Caleb's wanted for murder?"
translation.zh: 他说：“凯勒布因为谋杀受通缉？”

translation.en: And I'm like,
translation.zh: 我就

translation.en: "Nope, haven't heard that. Crap, what happened?"
translation.zh: “没啊 没听说 我去 怎么回事？”

translation.zh: 我叫泰德罗门考 是联合县公诉人

translation.en: Uh, we're here today to announce that an arrest warrant has been issued
translation.zh: 今天 我们宣布签发了一则逮捕令

translation.en: for the arrest of, uh, Caleb, uh, McGillvary.
translation.zh: 逮捕对象是凯勒布麦基瓦利

translation.en: We felt he was dangerous. I mean, here's a man who was…
translation.zh: 我们认为他是危险人物 我是说 这是一个曾经…

translation.en: He attacked someone in California with a hatchet.
translation.zh: 他曾在加州用斧头袭击过他人

translation.en: He didn't know that driver more than a few hours,
translation.zh: 他认识那位司机不过几小时

translation.en: and he attacked him.
translation.zh: 他攻击了他

translation.en: And he was roaming around our area somewhere,
translation.zh: 他在我们这一代某处游荡

translation.en: and we thought he was an extremely dangerous character,
translation.zh: 我们认为他有着极度危险的特性

translation.en: so we advised the public of that.
translation.zh: 特此向公众告知

translation.en: We don't know where he is, but we do know
translation.zh: 我们不知道他身处何处 但我们知道

translation.en: that this man is used to being on the road,
translation.zh: 这个人习惯流浪在外

translation.en: and he is considered dangerous.
translation.zh: 被认为是危险人物

translation.en: Make no mistake about it.
translation.zh: 请务必牢记

translation.zh: 我们认为他是携带武器的危险人物

translation.en: [Lisa] My first thought is, like,
translation.zh: 我第一个念头是

translation.en: "Holy fucking shit. Like, this guy stayed at my house."
translation.zh: “我操 这人住过我家

translation.zh: 我本可能被杀 可能会发生可怕的事情”

translation.zh: 我想：“警察到底能找到他吗？”

translation.en: 'Cause he can easily disappear.
translation.zh: 因为他可以轻易消失

translation.en: I knew that Kai as a witness was hard to track down,
translation.zh: 我知道作为目击者的阿凯很难追踪

translation.en: and I kinda had some sympathy for the detectives with,
translation.zh: 我也对警探们有种同情心

translation.zh: “他们要怎么追踪 作为嫌疑人的他呢？”

translation.zh: 我被邮件淹没 被信息淹没

translation.zh: 因为我俩的名字总会联系到一起

translation.en: And it sucked.
translation.zh: 这太糟糕了

translation.zh: 我是说 太糟糕了

translation.en: because, you know, all I ever wanted was good things for this guy.
translation.zh: 因为我从来都只希望这个人能有好事

translation.en: Now… he's wanted for possibly killing someone.
translation.zh: 现在…他竟然因为 有可能杀了人而被通缉

translation.en: It blew my mind. "What do you mean there's a manhunt for Kai?
translation.zh: 我太震惊了 “你说外头在追捕阿凯是什么意思？

translation.en: "What's going on with Kai?"
translation.zh: 阿凯怎么了？”

translation.en: And it's all, "He killed a 70-something-odd-year-old man."
translation.zh: 得到回答都是： “他杀了个70多岁的老头”

translation.en: It's like, "No."
translation.zh: 我就：“不会吧”

translation.en: Three months ago, I'm searching for this guy
translation.zh: 三个月前 我到处寻找这个人

translation.en: to put him on television so we can all enjoy him.
translation.zh: 为了让他上电视 让大家为他高兴

translation.en: Three months later, the police are looking for this guy
translation.zh: 三个月后 警方在寻找这个人

translation.en: so he can be judged for killing a human being.
translation.zh: 为了让他受到杀人的审判

translation.en: [Jessob] Two days later, I still hadn't heard from him.
translation.zh: 两天过去了 我还是没有他的消息

translation.en: And then on Tuesday, May 14th, 2013,
translation.zh: 然后 2013年5月14日星期二

translation.en: Kai posted this on Facebook.
translation.zh: 阿凯在脸书发布了这个

translation.en: "What would you do if you woke up with a groggy head,
translation.zh: “如果你一觉醒来 昏昏沉沉

translation.zh: 满嘴金属味 身处陌生房子里…

translation.zh: 走到镜子前

translation.en: and seen come dripping from the side of your face
translation.zh: 看到脸颊旁边流下液体

translation.en: from your mouth, and started retching,
translation.zh: 从你嘴里 开始干呕

translation.en: realizing that someone had drugged, raped, and blown their fucking load in you?"
translation.zh: 意识到有人给你下了药 强奸了你 还他妈的内射了 你会怎么样？”

translation.zh: 最后是一个不祥的问题： “你会怎么做呢？”

translation.zh: 我记得转向我妻子

translation.zh: 对她说：“这人刚杀了人”

translation.en: What I know of Kai, I know that he has that switch,
translation.zh: 我所认识的阿凯 我知道他有这么个雷点

translation.zh: 他对暴力袭击 有一种根植心底的愤怒和憎恨

translation.en: But, I mean, I just don't believe…
translation.zh: 但我真的不相信…

translation.en: I don't think he would do something like that for no reason.
translation.zh: 我认为他并不会无故做出那种事情

translation.en: The manhunt needed to find him as quickly as possible
translation.zh: 搜捕行动必须尽快找到他

translation.en: to make sure that nobody else got hurt along the way.
translation.zh: 确保没有别人持续受害

translation.en: The investigation revealed there were communications
translation.zh: 调查显示 有一位年轻女性跟他联系过

translation.zh: 她是他的粉丝之一 行动小组称之为粉丝一号

translation.en: And this was somebody who Caleb had met, uh, through Facebook,
translation.zh: 她是凯勒布在脸书上结识的人

translation.en: had communicated with,
translation.zh: 与之联系过

translation.en: uh, somebody who had expressed interest in hanging out with him.
translation.zh: 并表达过跟他交往的兴趣

translation.en: They had made plans to get together. It was Mother's Day.
translation.zh: 他们计划好了碰面 那天是母亲节

translation.en: Caleb did not follow through on those plans,
translation.zh: 凯勒布并没有按这些计划行事

translation.en: and they didn't connect when they were originally supposed to.
translation.zh: 他们没有按照原先说好的那样联系

translation.en: We then know that, uh, she did not hear from him
translation.zh: 后来我们才知道 直到当晚大约九点

translation.zh: 她才又收到他的信息

translation.zh: 他开始不断给她打电话 不停发信息

translation.zh: 要求她去接他

translation.zh: 要求她送他离开克拉克地区

translation.zh: 您的电话已转接到语音信箱

translation.zh: 嘿 金 我是阿凯

translation.zh: 我住的地方待不成了

translation.zh: 我在想 你还能开车过来吗？

translation.zh: 能来的话就太好啦

translation.zh: 不过 对 给我回信息吧

translation.zh: 我电话总断掉

translation.zh: 周日深夜快到周一时 凯勒布成功出了拉威市

translation.zh: 去往阿斯伯里帕克

translation.en: He met up with Fan Number One.
translation.zh: 他和粉丝一号见了面

translation.en: They took some photos together,
translation.zh: 合影了几张

translation.en: and she had told investigators that she was surprised
translation.zh: 后来她告诉调查员 她很惊讶

translation.en: because his appearance was different
translation.zh: 因为他的样貌变了

translation.en: from what she knew of his video appearances
translation.zh: 跟她在视频上看到的不一样

translation.en: as well as his Facebook pictures.
translation.zh: 跟他脸书上的也不一样

translation.zh: 他显然剪了头发

translation.zh: 这对于后面的调查起到了帮助

translation.zh: 但现在 我们得到了近照

translation.zh: 能看到他的短发

translation.zh: 还有他面部纹身 非常细节

translation.en: and that picture went out around the world.
translation.zh: 这张照片传遍了全世界

translation.en: [reporter] An employee inside a Starbucks recognized him
translation.zh: 一家星巴克的店员认出了他

translation.en: and quickly called 911.
translation.zh: 立刻拨打911报警

translation.zh: 警察赶到时 他已经不在了

translation.zh: 警察开始在附近搜寻

translation.zh: 一位警察去了灰狗城际巴士站碰运气

translation.zh: 看到他在候车区 马上呼叫增援

translation.zh: 接着实施了逮捕

translation.zh: -能不能告诉我们发生什么事？ -告诉我们发生什么事吧？

translation.zh: 律师建议我不要跟你们说话

translation.zh: 谢谢所有支持我的人

translation.zh: 他看起来确实不一样了

translation.zh: 他留着短发 脸上刺着纹身

translation.zh: 我之前在社交平台 看过他的面部纹身 但…

translation.zh: 而且 你知道 也许是因为周围环境吧

translation.zh: 现在他被关押 受到谋杀缉拿

translation.zh: 对他的看法也在改变 他不是英雄 他是反派

translation.zh: 二月 挥斧头的搭车人阿凯

translation.zh: 冒着生命危险在西弗雷斯诺救人性命

translation.zh: 今天 他因涉嫌杀害一位

translation.zh: 新泽西男性而被捕

translation.zh: 这太悲伤了

translation.zh: 我们不得不报道这位曾是英雄的青年

translation.zh: 现正因为杀害另一名男士在押

translation.zh: 从头开始告诉我们一切你想说的

translation.zh: 他在时代广场碰见的我

translation.zh: 他说：“噢 你好像迷路了 要去哪？”

translation.en: of anyone in the media saying, "Boy, did we make a mistake?"
translation.zh: 媒体中任何人的分析说： “天呐 我们是不是搞错了？

translation.en: "Did we create this celebrity and monster without doing our homework?"
translation.zh: 我们是不是没有做功课 造出了这个名人和魔鬼的结合体？”

translation.en: I think what Bob's saying is if you're going to glorify someone,
translation.zh: 我觉得鲍勃的意思是 如果你要将某人塑造成神

translation.en: you better know who you're glorifying.
translation.zh: 你必须了解你要造神的这个人

translation.en: I can sit here and say I did everything the right way and tried to…
translation.zh: 我可以坐在这说 我用正确的方式做了一切…

translation.en: tried to do everything for him and have him be successful and happy
translation.zh: 也尽力为他能够成功和快乐付出一切

translation.en: and… I don't know, expose the good in him and hide the bad,
translation.zh: 以及…我不知道 暴露他的闪光点 隐藏他的阴暗面

translation.en: and I just couldn't, I guess.
translation.zh: 可能我就是做不到吧

translation.en: No one could, I guess.
translation.zh: 可能没人能做到吧

translation.en: [Shirley] In our communication, I've told him before,
translation.zh: 在我俩的交流中 我也跟他说过

translation.en: if ever he wants me to visit him, I will.
translation.zh: 只要他想要我去探视 我会去的

translation.en: Right now he's said no.
translation.zh: 现在他是拒绝了

translation.en: I don't know if I ever will see him again.
translation.zh: 我不知道还能不能再见他一面

translation.en: [Brad] There's no more home-free. There's no more Dogtown.
translation.zh: 再也不提不用家 再也不提狗镇

translation.en: There's no more anything, ever.
translation.zh: 再也没有任何了 永远

translation.en: Your address is gonna be your address forever,
translation.zh: 你的地址永远都是你的地址

translation.en: and this is a guy who never wanted an address.
translation.zh: 而这是一个从不想要有地址的人

translation.en: Good God.
translation.zh: 老天爷啊
